_header: Love will I and leve so may befall
Subjects: love lyrics; songs; farewells, lovers’; counsel, in love
_description: A love song — one stanza rhyme royal

BodeMus88.Transcription:
Love wylle I and leve so may be falleHold ȝe nat wysdome in the
                    gouernaunceffor hit is a peyne vsitte who so euer shalleEuer more for
                    to a bide in lovys daunce
BodeMus88.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “A Late-Fifteenth Century Love Lyric.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         69 (1954): 153-60: 158.
